GSD.description:
xtensa: xtfpga: Fix refcount leak bug in setup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.51 by commit 0162451723178602c37f0555d235dfa17e486112. For more details please see the references link.
